sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState, useContext } from 'react'; import styles from './Details.module.css'; import * as carService from '../../services/carService.js' import AuthContext from '../../context/authContext.js'; const Details = ({ match }) => { // console.log(match.params.carId) const [car, setCar] = useState({}) let { user } = useContext(AuthContext) useEffect(() => { carService.getOne(match.params.carId) .then(result => { setCar(result) }) }, [match.params.carId]) const ownerButtons = ( <> ); const userButtons = ( <> ) return (
{car.brand}

Car Info:

Price: {car.price} BGN

Year: {car.year}

Category: {car.category}

Mileage: {car.mileage} km

Horse Power: {car.horsePower} hp

Fuel: {car.fuel}

Gearbox: {car.gearbox}

Color: {car.color}

Extras:

{car.extras}

Description:

{car.description}

Seller Info:

Location: {car.location}

Contact Number: {car.contactNumber}

{user.userId == car.creator ? ownerButtons : userButtons}

Like: 0

Dislike: 0

) } export default Details
